PawnColumnDef.label: current food policy
PawnColumnDef.headerTip: The food policy currently assigned to this pawn.

PawnColumnDef.label: home food policy
PawnColumnDef.headerTip: The food policy this pawn will revert to when arriving at a player home map.

PawnColumnDef.label: caravan food policy
PawnColumnDef.headerTip: The food policy this pawn will automatically switch to when forming a caravan.
